Unknown.translation: (Before the girl is married off, the bride is adorned with ornaments and jewellery) and the rays of Sun falling on her, make her look more good. Her friends come to embellish her more.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: sUrj dIAwˆ ikrxwˆ sUrj cVHy swr sKI Awx ky qyry suKdweI AMgwˆ nUM ABrn gihixAwˆ nwl suAwr iSMgwr idMdI hY (sI)[

Unknown.translation: Paste of herbs, oil and salts is rubbed on her body, the hair are massaged with scents and oil and then shampooed with lukewarm water. Her body then starts radiating like gold.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: pr ieauˆ, pihly vtnw ipMfy qy ml ky Aqy isr ivc mYl invwrxI Es smyˆ Anuswr dhIˆ swbn vq kyswˆ ivc pOx jog vsqU pw ky grm jl nwl pRym pUrbk SuD BOxI sihq = cMgI qrwˆ Snwn krOˆdI hY (sI)[

lines.gurmukhi: kusm Avys kys bwsq Pulyl myl; AMg Argjw lyp hoq aupjwie kY [

Unknown.translation: Adoring the hair with flowers, applying the mixture of fragranced and scented mixture on the body, the feeling of romance and love is incited.

Unknown.translation: Wearing beautiful dresses, seeing her beautiful form in the mirror, she occupies the bed of her dear husband. Then her wandering mind does not wander any more and becomes stable and restful. (346)
